constructor.details: Constructor que establece el token de pago y el propietario

params._tokenAddress: Dirección del contrato del token ERC20

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processPayment(uint256,address).details: El comprador debe aprobar previamente los tokens

params.amount: Monto total del pago en tokens
params.recipient: Dirección del vendedor que recibirá el pago

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.cashbackRate: Tasa de cashback en puntos base (100 = 1%)
params.minPurchase: Compra mínima en tokens para obtener cashback
params.pointsRate: Puntos por cada token gastado (ej: 100 = 1 punto por token)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

processPayment(uint256,address).notice: Procesa un pago con cashback en tokens

withdrawFunds(uint256).notice: Permite al propietario retirar tokens atrapados
